org.platanios.learn.optimization

Enum CoordinateDescentSolver.Method

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<CoordinateDescentSolver.Method>
      • org.platanios.learn.optimization.CoordinateDescentSolver.Method
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CoordinateDescentSolver.Method>
    Enclosing class:
    CoordinateDescentSolver

    public static enum CoordinateDescentSolver.Method
extends java.lang.Enum<CoordinateDescentSolver.Method>
    An enumeration of all currently supported coordinate descent methods.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BACK_AND_FORTH
      The algorithm goes back and forth over the coordinates (it uses the coordinates in the following order: \(1,2,\hdots,n-1,n,n-1,\hdots,2,1,2,\hdots\)).
      CYCLE
      The algorithm cycles over the coordinates (after it uses the last coordinate it goes back to the first one).
      CYCLE_AND_JOIN_ENDPOINTS
      The algorithm cycles over the coordinates as with the CYCLE restartMethod, but after each cycle completes, it takes a step in the direction computed as the difference between the first point in the cycle and the last point in the cycle.
